attributes.action: stop the removal of No 10 e-petitions because you disagree with them!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believed that petitions on this website would be left for the duration and would be fairly considered by the Prime Minister and seen by the public. A recent petition I and some others had signed was removed around 10 months early because the Prime Minister disagreed with the content... this is not the point of petitions at all!

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
